title: Ranked problems
body:
Hi, I'm having trouble with ranked this season and I seem to make the wrong decisions in game. I have been playing this game for three years now and I can't understand what I'm doing wrong. I'd appreciate it if someone could give me some advice and point me in the right direction. I play adc and top lane.
[](http://www.lolking.net/summoner/oce/684054#profile)
[](http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=vanhelsing)

replies.body: I just lost 22 LP because some retard decided to dodge at load time. Thanks riot. So to answer your question... you rank up with luck.
Not really, give a pro player a bronze account and I guarantee that the account would be diamond and up in a week or 2.
Yeh I beg to differ. I just finished a game where three of my team didn't get any kills until the last minute, like literally 1 minute or less before we lost.

Hey guys, thanks for the advice. Another year has passed and things are looking better.  However I'm struggling with CS and keeping ahead of my opponents.  I want to improve but I'm not sure if I should continue to play ranked, I've lost quite a few games because of this.
Just practice in norms if you're having trouble then return to ranked when you regain confidence. :^)

Hey bud, I think this resource will help you a lot with ranked, it has helped me improve: https://www.reddit.com/r/SummonerSchool

Also use this checklist: https://docs.google.com/document/d/11lFfd5W1uXt2Eg_b8MqiLVKjizjnZTEQZ-xrIyXT1S4/preview?pref=2&pli=1

Most important thing about ranked is to NOT TILT. As soon as you start tilting, give up ranked for a couple of hours and play normals, if you tilt, you play worse and therefore have a worse chance of winning.

I also had a look at your op.gg: http://oce.op.gg/summoner/userName=VanHelsing

The number one thing I think you can improve straight off the bat is the ability to cs. Check that checklist I have linked, you need to practice in custom games to get good cs. In one of your ranked games, after 30 minutes you have 140 cs, you want to aim for 80 cs per 10 minutes, if you were following that general number your cs should be around 240 cs. Thats a large gold difference. If you can farm well in bronze, you can carry without making flashy plays.

Have a good night.

Prioritising gold over all else is the way to climb bronze/silver and to some extent gold.

This includes playing from behind and taking priority objectives. I played a S5 game the other night. Warwick top into GP. Suffice to say the GP got absolutely out of control but he didn't know how to push his lead for his team. So in the end I outfarmed everyone else in the game and they couldn't kill me.

Gold = Freelo

I can try and help.
Let me see what I can find, you might also wanna try looking through these.
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=7XPrqvD8Lfo&list=PLyCEt27AsZuvNu0RQiCwgV2j3tR4foqvI

They are bronze summoners like yourself, you could very well be doing some of there mistakes.

------- 
Checking you match history.

You play alot of ADC -Markmsan- and top. ADC is my worst role, but top is one of my best ones.
Your normal builds actually aint that bad. from a first look anyway.

But from the looks of you CSing however.
You should aim for 80 CS per 10 mins.
I can see plenty of games where you are not meeting this requirement.

Also, are you getting objectives? Dragons, towers etc.
You need to buy a pink and place it somewhere, anywhere. And maybe upgrade your sweeper by lvl 11-12.

I'm just vaguely going through it all. Maybe try and watch some of those vids, and see what you are doing wrong.

I was bronze 3 and got to silver 5 in a week. There are many aspects to the game and one of the most important one is knowing the enemy's summoner time. This applies to me alot because I play jungle in ranked and once I burn a flash or so from the enemy laner, I camp that lane and make sure I abuse the fact that they do not have summoner spells for the time being. Warding, warding can save your life or even your team mates life, make sure to ward at spots where the enemy jungler usually goes. Last but not least. objectives, objectives in bronze,silver and sometimes even gold are not properly prioritized, most bronze and silver goes for kills instead of better objectives like towers or baron. Now that there is more than one dragon, sometimes instead of going for a dragon like "Earth" dragon or "Cloud" dragon you can go for towers instead but if say "Ocean" dragon is the one available then you go for that instead of towers since it is more beneficial. There are many more aspects and I recommend you go watch videos on how to climb elo or maybe search up a player who is really good at a specific role or a specific champion. Have a good night/day :). Just let me know if you have anymore questions by replying to this or adding me in game: iAkeno.
